Introduction
Org\Heigl\Hyphenator is a package to enable word-hyphenation in PHP. It uses the algorithms described by Marc Liang in his thesis Word Hyphenation by computer and the extensions described by László Németh in his work Automatic non-standard hyphenation in OpenOffice.org.
These algorithms are based on matching words against certain patterns that describe places inside a word where hyphenation is possible or must not occur. This Hyphenator uses the pattern-files from OpenOffice which are based on the pattern-files created for TeX.
